credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Medallion portrait of Queen Mary I of Portugal
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and gray wash
description: Horizontal rectangle. The medallion hangs from fasces which stand in front of a manteling, hanging from a crown. Symbols, referring to the queen, are beside. Colored background. Framing line.
name: Drawing
